title: Teacher Leadership Development and Gradual Responsibility Transfer Mentoring Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic leadership experience in educational settings and understanding of mentoring principles
context.additional_context: Large-scale cohort of language education professionals, utilizing digital devices for collaborative and project-based assessment environments

learning_goals: Learners can specifically design mentoring strategies to support peer teachers' leadership growth by applying the gradual release of responsibility model
Learners can explain methods for building social capital to develop teacher leadership by applying them to real-world cases
Learners can continuously improve leadership practice competencies through peer feedback in project-based assessment environments

resources: Collaboration Tools (Digital Whiteboard, Real-Time Polling System)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
